headline: ADVANCED ENERGY PE II to PE ADAPTER
description: PE II to PE I/O adapter 3152600-000
categories.lvl2: Test & Measurement Equipment  >  Power Supplies > Radio Frequency (RF) Generators
specstable:
Manufacturer Advanced Energy
Model 3152600-000
Description PE II to PE I/O adapter
Accessories


24VDC transformer, center pin NEGATIVE

Other Information

The PE to PEII Interface Adapter makes the interface of the PEII 10 kW work like
the interface of the PE 10kW by converting PE I/O signals to PEII I/O signals.

Exterior Dimensions
Width 4.500 in (11.4 cm)
Depth 1.750 in (4.4 cm)
Height 0.750 in (1.9 cm)
